item.description:
I am co-hosting The Wedeln Ski & Snowboard Film Festival this Sunday in downtown Boston. We have a great lineup on movies. This is sure to be a cool event and the location is ideal for showing films but keeping it a party.

The Wedeln Ski & Snowboard Film Festival
Date: Nov 23rd
Location: "The Place" , 2 Broad Street, Boston
Time: 7pm to 10pm
Cost: $15
free appetizers and many door prizes.
21+

Films include:
"Eastern Boarder"
"Blurred" by Huckfest
Poor Boyz Productions "Reasons!"
Rage Films "Such is Life"

Proceeds from the film festival will go to the Peter Bragan Ski Race Scholarship. This scholarship helps several high school ski racers compete at the national level.

Pre-sale tickets are $10 but only available at the Wedeln Ski Club booth at the Ski Expo (booth e11) at Bayside Expo center this weekend or if you bump into me :).

Several Meetups will be at the the film festival.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be near the entrance at the start.

group.name: Boston Ski, Snowboard, and Outdoor Adventurers Meetup Group

item.name: Ski & Snowboard Film Festival
